pullrequest.title: Support joint creation between nested model links in model editor

content.raw: So I'm looking at the schematic view now and playing with changing the parent/child links of joints. There are a few problems when there are nested links involved, the arrow becomes a black line and stops appearing sometimes.
content.html: So I'm looking at the schematic view now and playing with changing the parent/child links of joints. There are a few problems when there are nested links involved, the arrow becomes a black line and stops appearing sometimes.
